response.original_title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
response.overview: The Fantastic Four return to the big screen as a new and all powerful enemy threatens the Earth. The seemingly unstoppable 'Silver Surfer', but all is not what it seems and there are old and new enemies that pose a greater threat than the intrepid superheroes realize.
response.tagline: Discover the secret of the Surfer.
response.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
